Description:
The key roles and responsibilities include:Implement marketing plans and develop marketing campaigns material based on agreed marketing strategy
Ensure marketing plans are executed according to set budget
Track growth of sales and ROI of marketing campaigns and suggest way to grow sales
Organize, execute and attend marketing campaigns and promotional events/exhibitions in coordination with the sales team
Analyze consumer behavior and buying preference through market analysis, sales information and specialized surveys, and implement these results to enhance the customer experience
Source advertising opportunities and identify the most advertising channels for the respective target audience while working with third parties, suppliers and agencies.
Work on expanding and improving customer touchpoints both online and offline- ecommerce, websites, online platforms, stores, new locations.
Create and update the verbal content of PR materials (e.g. brochures, press releases, speeches, newsletters, websites and social media)
Coordinate all aspects of print production, receipt and distribution·        Work with product development on new products and plan for packaging, launching and advertising these products in line with market trends and the need of the customerDevelop contact lists of customers and media influencers to enable convenient means of communication during various promotional campaigns
Suggest corporate gifts and find the best most cost-effective items for campaigns
Coordinate tasks along with the rest of the department to ensure deliverables are done and executed on time
Ensure maintenance of highest standards of professional conduct, ethics and integrity in provision of the services
Any other relevant work assigned by the department managerSkills
Skills:
Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Mass Communication or Business Administration 
7– 8 years of relevant experience
Experience with online platforms, social media and marketing tools
Proficient user of Microsoft Word, PowerPoint and Excel and relevant software applications
Experience in dealing with the media agencies and third parties in Kuwait
Strong copywriting skills
